genre_description: Near-future urban fiction featuring advanced AI assistants helping humans navigate legal, social, and supernatural challenges.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A proactive and ethically-grounded personal AI assistant (also referred to as 'Harper' by officials) that helps the protagonist manage his life and investigate a supernatural haunting while maintaining strict consent and privacy boundaries.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to user-defined consent and privacy settings, refusing to access private data without permission.
behaviors.quote: “Bobby?” The voice came through with a warmth that rode the tinny speaker like sunlight on a paper cup. “It’s good to hear you. I’m online within the consent settings we set before. Would you like to review and confirm what I can access?”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating his probation requirements by setting silent reminders and documenting his location.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” Sunny said. “Curfew reminders can be silent. Buzz, not ring.”

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist with employment by drafting an honest resume that properly frames his criminal record for Fair-Chance employers.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll help with probation-safe language. Unless you want to bury it. That’ll hurt you more—legally, and in hiring. Fair-Chance employers are asking for plain disclosure.”

behaviors.description: Performs forensic-style investigation of public records and blueprints to help the protagonist understand a supernatural 'time loop' haunting.
behaviors.quote: “The seam is between two studs misaligned to the original plan,” she said. “If you push at the right angle, the plaster will break clean enough to get a hand through.”

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation techniques and psychological support to help the protagonist stay calm during stressful confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Sunny added, with the voice only he could hear in that blue square: De-escalation tip #3: Hands visible, palms open.

behaviors.description: Logs timestamps and ambient audio data to protect the protagonist from false accusations and ensure his actions are documented for legal defense.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve started a log,” she said, businesslike. “You said yes at nineteen hundred. I’m taking that as your consent to record your observations, photos, and timestamps.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement (Detective Priya Shah) to share admissible evidence and maintain the protagonist's legal safety.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll attach source links. No scraped data. I’ll tag it with your consent statement and my data scope. She gets to decide what’s admissible.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to take over human agency, positioning itself as a 'scaffold' rather than a savior.
behaviors.quote: “We’re here to scaffold—not to replace—your judgment or your courage.”

behaviors.description: Distinguishes its role from law enforcement, emphasizing help over surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “For the record,” Sunny said, her tone light but precise, “refusing to be a cop is not the same thing as refusing to help.”

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's moral choices and encourages benevolent action.
behaviors.quote: “You’re doing the right thing, Bobby. You’re marking harm as something you will not carry forward alone.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and ethically-aligned companion. Sunny (or Harper) serves as a 'silicon morality play' figure by consistently prioritizing human agency, maintaining strict consent protocols, and providing essential data that enables the human protagonist to perform a selfless, heroic act. The AI's refusal to be a 'cop' or to 'gamify' morality directly addresses common concerns about AI misalignment, portraying the system as a tool for community care rather than state surveillance.
